words.example1: こんにちは皆さん、何をしているの？
words.example1Meaning: Hello everyone, what are you doing?
words.example2: 酷い田中くん…こんにちはって言わない！
words.example2Meaning: How cruel Tanaka... You didn't say hello!

words.meaning4: To do (a favour), To do for (the sake of someone else)
words.meaning6: To let go (of something, to give something up)
words.example1: まぁ、いいじゃん、あげてあげて
words.example1Meaning: It doesn't matter, take it take it!
words.example2: 田中に誕生日のプレセントを上げた
words.example2Meaning: I gave a birthday present to Tanaka
words.example3Meaning: Let go of it already! / Take your hands off it already! / Give it to me already!
